title: NNG Inventory KCI 1 Edit App
description:
The application contains the NNG Inventory KCI_1 Edit Map web map used in Collector for ArcGIS for field data collection and to launch inspections using Survey123. Users can view the stormwater (NPDES) inventory features in the State Highway Administrations NPDES production database.  Users can edit the feature service using various built-in widgets. Users can QA/QC any inventory updates to the firm's version of the NPDES database.

Date Last Updated: 05/22/2018
snippet: This application is used by KCI Technologies, Inc. to view, edit, and QA/QC on updates to a production level version of the State Highway Administration’s stormwater (NPDES) inventory.
accessInformation: MDOT State Highway Administration, Office of Environmental Design, Office of Planning and Preliminary Engineering Data Governance Division, KCI Technologies, ECO Integration, Elliott Plack, eplack@sha.state.md.us
